meanings.definition: Relating to or involving a catastrophe or disaster.
meanings.sent1: The apocalyptic storm caused massive damage to the town.
meanings.sent2: The movie depicted an apocalyptic event where the city was destroyed.
meanings.sent3: The apocalyptic flood turned the streets into rivers.
meanings.sent4: The apocalyptic earthquake shook the entire region to its core.
meanings.sent5: The apocalyptic scene of destruction left everyone in shock.

meanings.definition: Describing or prophesying the end of the world.
meanings.sent1: The apocalyptic prediction foretold the end of all humanity.
meanings.sent2: The cult believed in an apocalyptic future where only the chosen would survive.
meanings.sent3: The apocalyptic prophecy made some people stock up on canned food.
meanings.sent4: The apocalyptic vision haunted the dreamers with thoughts of doom.
meanings.sent5: The apocalyptic warning echoed through the minds of those who heard it.

meanings.definition: Characterized by widespread destruction or devastation.
meanings.sent1: The apocalyptic aftermath of the war left the city in ruins.
meanings.sent2: The apocalyptic fire consumed everything in its path.
meanings.sent3: The apocalyptic chaos caused by the storm led to a city-wide blackout.
meanings.sent4: The apocalyptic scene of destruction was overwhelming to witness.
meanings.sent5: The apocalyptic impact of the disaster was felt for years to come.
